titles.title: Valerie Plame Wilson Compensation Act
For the relief of Valerie Plame Wilson.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E118-119)
Referred to the House Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select).

bill.summary:
1/16/2007--Introduced.
Valerie Plame Wilson Compensation Act - Provides for the relief of Valerie Plame Wilson.
